titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I got up feeling miserable enough, and I attempted to do some work but it was to no purpose. About midday I "chucked up the sponge", and went to bed. Ella took Harold in my place to West Hartlepool, & saw the launching of a large ship.
